title: Manus AI — AI Tool Review
description: Manus AI is a general-purpose autonomous AI agent that can browse the web, write and run code, manage files, and complete complex multi-step tasks independently. Manus AI is one of the most advanced autonomous AI agents available, capable of completing long-horizon tasks that involve web browsing, coding, file management, form filling, and data analysis — all without human intervention. It was developed by the Chinese startup Monica and went viral for its demonstration of fully autonomous computer use. Currently available by invitation. Highlights: Fully autonomous task completion. Web browsing and research. Code writing and execution. File management. Handles complex multi-step workflows.
